mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stock_master ( name, model, maker, stock_type, rent_flag, ownership_type, lease_return_date, remarks, del ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{model}, #{maker}, #{stockType}, #{rentFlag}, #{ownershipType}, #{leaseReturnDate}, #{remarks}, #{del} )
mapper.update: UPDATE stock_data SET stock_code = #{stockCode}, confirmed_date = CURRENT_DATE WHERE id = #{id}
